Welcome to iDEA's API documentation!
====================================

In this page, we provide the full API documentation of the iDEA code.

For more information please see the `iDEA home page <https://idea-org.github.io/>`_.
The full code can be found on `GitHub <https://github.com/iDEA-org/iDEA>`_.
We also provide a `tutorial <https://github.com/iDEA-org/iDEA/blob/master/tutorial/tutorial.ipynb>`_ so you can learn how to use the iDEA code in your research and teaching projects.
